content:
Thadavil poyu yoohaanonte - thala veeshuvathinavaneeshan
Kolayaallikku thidukkatthil - kalppana nalki ayachullllil
Khinnathayodu karanyevam - chonnaan, ninne konnennaal
Haa! Kashdam! Kartthaavenne kopam poondu dahippikkum
Mrthyu ninakku varutthaaykil- mannavanenne chhedikkum
Ennaalum kopattheeyil; Daivam veezhtthaatthathu bhaagyam.
